oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Kitāb yusammá bi-al-ʻUqūd al-laʼālī fī al-asānīd al-ʻawālī al-muttaṣilah bi-shaykh shuyūkhinā al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah wa-al-Muḥaqqiq al-mudaqqiq al-fahhāmah al-Sayyid Muḥammad Shākir al-ʻAqqād al-ʻUmarī / taʼlīf tilmīdhihi khātimat al-muḥaqqiqīn al-Sayyid Muḥammad Amīn al-shahīr bi-Ibn ʻĀbidīn : manuscript, 1860
ʻUqūd al-laʼālī fī al-asānīd al-ʻawālī
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Ibn ʻĀbidīn, Muḥammad Amīn ibn ʻUmar , 1783 or 1784-1836
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: بسم الله الرحمن الرحيم حمدا لمن وصل من انقطع اليه برحمته الاولية ورفع على السوى ... :Incipit
Written in one column, 29 lines per page, in black rubricated in red.
Copy completed on 9 Ramaḍān 1276 AH [April 1, 1860 AD] in the hand of Muḥammad Anīs al-Ṭālawī. Copy made from the author's own fair copy.
There is a note signed ʻAbd al-Salām al-Shaṭṭī al-Ḥanbalī, 1289 AH [1872-3 AD].
MS Arab 169. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: ʻUmarī, Muḥammad Shākir--1744-1807
Hadith--Authorities
Muslim scholars
Ulama
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: ابن عابدين، محمد امين بن عمر، , 1783 or 1784-1836
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: عقود اللآلي في الاسانيد العوالي

كتاب يسمى بالعقود اللآلي في الاسانيد العوالي المتصلة بشيخ شيوخنا العالم العلامة والمحقق المدقق الفهامة السيد محمد شاكر العقاد العمري تأليف تلميذه خاتمة المحققين السيد محمد امين الشهير بابن عابدين : مخطوطة، 1860
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: عمري، محمد شاكر،--1744-1807
